Christian education and eternal Life. 


     "Now as never before we need to understand the true science of education. If we fail to understand this, we shall never have a place in the kingdom of God. 'This is life eternal, that they might know thee, the only true God, and 
                                                                           7
Jesus Christ whom thou hast sent.' If this is the price of heaven, shall not our education be given on these lines?"--P.C. July 8, 1897.
